#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int count=0;
int main()
{
	int test;
	//fast_io(test);
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test--)
	{
		string s;
		cin>>s;
		int i;
		for(i=0;i<s.length();i++)
		if(s[i]=='D'&&count==0)
		{cout<<"NO\n";break;
		}
		else if(s[i]=='D')
		count--;
		else 
		count++;
		
		if(count==0&&i==s.length())
		cout<<"YES\n";
		else if(i==s.length()) cout<<"NO\n";
		
		
		count=0;
		
		
	}
	
	
}
